content.html: Reading manuals is extremely helpful. I discovered the "accept-new" option for ssh strict host key checking and now I can delete my buggy code for manually populating known_hosts. ðŸ˜… Does exactly what it says. If the host key not in known_hosts, add it. Fail otherwise.
content.value:
Reading manuals is extremely helpful. 

I discovered the "accept-new" option for ssh strict host key checking and now I can delete my buggy code for manually populating known_hosts. ðŸ˜…

Does exactly what it says. If the host key not in known_hosts, add it. Fail otherwise.
